title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a browser and navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Verify that the page title is 'Swag Labs' and both the Username and Password fields are visible.
3. Click inside the Username input field (placeholder='Username').
4. Type the exact text standard_user into the Username field and confirm the text appears.
5. Click inside the Password input field (placeholder='Password').
6. Type the exact text secret_sauce into the Password field (text may be masked).
8. Wait for the browser to finish loading the next page.
10. Confirm that an element unique to the inventory page (e.g., the page title 'Products' or the inventory container) is visible, proving login succeeded.
